pages.title: Forestry
pages.text: Forestry deals with farming, renewable energy production as well as the breeding of trees, bees and butterflies in Minecraft.$(br2)$(l:https://minecraftguides.net/AS/)Forestry Wiki$(/l)$(br2)Note: It's highly Recommended you use a darkmode browser addon for the wiki.

pages.title: Important
pages.text: $(l)Cross-breeding:$(br)$()The dynamic version of the Forestry trees will NOT cross breed, if you want to breed trees you will need to use the non-dynamic version.$(br)After obtaining a new species, it can be made dynamic using the dirt-bucket recipe.$(br)$(l:modwikis/36_dynamictrees#dirtbucket)See here$(/l)$(br)Dynamic trees will also NOT be affected by genetic features like height.$(br2)See next page to get started.

'The Forester's Manual' is given to you when you first join the server. If you lose this, refer to any of these crafting recipes to make another.$(br2)Besides the wiki, this manual is a convenient way to learn Forestry.
